comments.body:
I test this in REPL:
```
scala> val binarizer: Binarizer = new Binarizer()
binarizer: org.apache.spark.ml.feature.Binarizer = Binarizer: uid=binarizer_3eab2c2d88f6

scala> binarizer.setInputCols(Array("a", "b"))
res3: binarizer.type = Binarizer: uid=binarizer_3eab2c2d88f6, numInputCols=2

scala> binarizer.setOutputCols(Array("c", "d"))
res4: binarizer.type = Binarizer: uid=binarizer_3eab2c2d88f6, numInputCols=2, numOutputCols=2
```
